apple_vendor_description: This delightful emoji on Apple devices depicts a tender kiss shared between two women, rendered with Apple's characteristic soft, rounded features and nuanced skin tones. The medium-light and light skin tones are depicted with subtle gradients, adding a touch of realism and warmth to the affectionate gesture. With a gentle, sweet expression and a subtle blush, this emoji beautifully conveys love, romance, and a heartfelt connection, embodying the inclusivity and emotional depth found in Apple's emoji designs.
